Lyric:
[00:00.00]
[00:01.00]
[00:23.97]Just waking up in the morning gotta thank god

[00:27.03]I don't know but today seems kinda odd

[00:29.97]No barking from the dogs, no smog

[00:32.75]And momma cooked a breakfast with no hog

[00:35.89]I got my grub on, but didn't pig out

[00:38.34]Finally got a call from a girl wanna dig out

[00:41.74]Hooked it up on later as i hit the do'

[00:44.40]Thinking will i live, another twenty-fo'

[00:47.06]I gotta go cause i got me a drop top

[00:50.01]And if i hit the switch, i can make the ass drop

[00:53.59]Had to stop at a red light

[00:55.97]Looking in my mirror not a jacker in sight

[00:58.95]And everything is alright

[01:01.14]I got a beep from kim and she can fuck all night

[01:05.32]Called up the homies and i'm askin y'all

[01:08.07]Which court, are y'all playin basketball?

[01:11.15]Get me on the court and i'm trouble

[01:13.67]Last week fucked around and got a triple double

[01:16.58]Freaking brothers everyway like m.j.

[01:19.49]I can't believe, today was a good day

[01:33.97]Drove to the pad and hit the showers

[01:36.01]Didn't even get no static from the cowards

[01:38.83]Cause just yesterday them fools tried to blast me

[01:42.56]Saw the police and they rolled right past me

[01:45.96]No flexin, didn't even look in a niggaz direction

[01:49.54]As i ran the intersection

[01:51.78]Went to $hort dog's house, they was watchin yo! mtv raps

[01:54.87]What's the haps on the craps

[01:57.11]Shake em up, shake em up, shake em up, shake em

[01:59.86]Roll em in a circle of niggaz and watch me break em

[02:03.05]With the seven, seven-eleven, seven-eleven

[02:06.59]Seven even back do lil'joe

[02:09.44]I picked up the cash flow

[02:11.82]Then we played bones, and i'm yellin domino

[02:14.77]Plus nobody i know got killed in south central l.a.

[02:19.00]Today was a good day

[02:32.09]Left my niggaz house paid

[02:35.03]Picked up a girl been tryin to fuck since the twelve grade

[02:38.74]It's ironic, i had the brew she had the chronic

[02:42.28]The lakers beat the supersonics

[02:44.68]I felt on the big fat fanny

[02:46.88]Pulled out the jammy, and killed the punanny

[02:49.99]And my dick runs deep so deep so deep

[02:53.83]Put her ass to sleep

[02:55.90]Woke her up around one

[02:57.86]She didn't hesitate, to call ice cube the top gun

[03:01.53]Drove her to the pad and i'm coasting

[03:03.67]Took another sip of the potion hit the three-wheel motion

[03:07.54]I was glad everything had worked out

[03:10.80]Dropped her ass off, then i chirped out

[03:13.59]Today was like one of those fly dreams

[03:15.97]Didn't even see a berry flashing those high beams

[03:19.60]No helicopter looking for a murder

[03:21.75]Two in the morning got the fat burger

[03:24.71]Even saw the lights of the goodyear blimp

[03:27.29]And it read ice cube's a pimp

[03:30.60]Drunk as hell but no throwing up

[03:32.75]Half way home and my pager still blowing up

[03:36.12]Today i didn't even have to use my a.k.

[03:39.50]I got to say it was a good day.

[04:16.42]Hey wait, wait a minute fool

[04:16.91]Stop the shit

[04:18.55]What the fuck am i thinking about?
